verses.name: Acts 10:8
verses.text: And when he had declared all these things unto them, he sent them to Joppa.

verses.name: Acts 10:9
verses.text: On the morrow, as they went on their journey, and drew nigh unto the city, Peter went up upon the housetop to pray about the sixth hour:

verses.name: Acts 10:10
verses.text: And he became very hungry, and would have eaten: but while they made ready, he fell into a trance,

verses.name: Acts 10:11
verses.text: And saw heaven opened, and a certain vessel descending unto him, as it had been a great sheet knit at the four corners, and let down to the earth:
